attributes.action: Enforce Food Manufacturers to use Recyclable Packaging
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is no good stating all the time that Supermarkets and food manufacturers should be taxed or penalised for selling food in non recyclable packaging, ok it raises money for the government but it does not combat the issue of the waste still going to landfill. Lets force these companies to package their goods in recyclable packaging and make it illegal to use non-recyclable packaging.
